name: blog-hugo
description: Henrik's blog using static site engine Hugo

scripts.js:build:prod: browserify assets/scripts/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs -mc > static/site.js
scripts.sass:build: node-sass assets/styles/main.sass static/site.css && node-sass assets/styles/print.sass static/print.css
scripts.sass:build:prod: node-sass assets/styles/main.sass static/site.css --output-style compressed && node-sass assets/styles/print.sass static/print.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build:assets: npm run clean && npm run sass:build:prod && npm run js:build:prod
scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others "npm run js:watch" "npm run sass:watch" "npm run hugo:watch"
scripts.serve:local: concurrently --kill-others "npm run js:watch" "npm run sass:watch" "npm run hugo:watch:localhost"
scripts.start:local: npm run clean && npm run sass:build && npm run js:build && hugo && npm run serve:local
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run sass:build && npm run js:build && hugo && npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run clean:public && hugo && npm run index:prod && npm run timestamp

author: Henrik Sommerfeld
